title: Linux gawk Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful gawk command in Linux, learn how to extract data from text files, perform calculations, and transform data efficiently.

meta.title: Linux gawk Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the powerful gawk command in Linux, learn how to extract data from text files, perform calculations, and transform data efficiently.
meta.keywords: gawk, text processing, data extraction, data transformation, Linux, command line

verify.name: Verify gawk version
verify.hint: Please ensure that you have GNU Awk version 5.1.0 installed on your system.

steps.title: Extracting Data from Text Files using gawk

verify.name: Verify age extraction
verify.hint: Please ensure that you can correctly extract the ages from the data.txt file using gawk.

verify.name: Verify name and city extraction
verify.hint: Please ensure that you can correctly extract the name and city from the data.txt file using gawk.

steps.title: Performing Calculations and Transformations with gawk

verify.name: Verify average age calculation
verify.hint: Please ensure that you can correctly calculate the average age using gawk.

verify.name: Verify age transformation
verify.hint: Please ensure that you can correctly transform the ages to years and months using gawk.
